{1}% of all damage you take is stored. The stored amount cannot exceed {2}% of your maximum health. The initial damage of your next Shadow Word: Pain deals this stored damage to your target.

Guardian Faerie: Reduces damage taken by {4}%. Follows your Power Word: Shield.

Benevolent Faerie: Increases the cooldown recovery rate of your target's major ability by {5}%. Follows your Shadow Mend.

1.Text:
Call forth three faerie guardians to attend your targets for {1} sec.

Wrathful Faerie: Any direct attacks against the target restore {2}% Mana or {3} Insanity. Follows your Shadow Word: Pain.

Guardian Faerie: Reduces damage taken by {4}%. Follows your Power Word: Shield.

Benevolent Faerie: Increases the cooldown recovery rate of your target's major ability by {5}%. Follows your Flash Heal.

0.Text: During Rapture, Power Word: Shield costs {1}% less mana and applies {2} second longer Atonements.

1.Text: Spirit Shell increases the duration of active Atonements by {1} sec, and reduces the mana cost of damage dealing spells by {2}%.

0.Text: Mind Blast and Shadow Word: Death cause your Shadowfiend to teleport behind your target, slashing up to {1} nearby enemies for {2} Shadowflame damage. Each time a rift is triggered, the duration of Shadowfiend is increased by {3} sec.

1.Text: Mind Blast and Shadow Word: Death cause your Mindbender to teleport behind your target, slashing up to {1} nearby enemies for {2} Shadowflame damage. Each time a rift is triggered, the duration of Mindbender is increased by {3} sec.

0.Text: Shadow Word: Death consumes {1} sec of Shadow Word: Pain and Vampiric Touch, instantly dealing that damage to the target and generating up to {2} Insanity.
When Shadow Word: Pain expires on a target, {1} allies within {2} yds of the target are healed for {3}.

1.Text: When Purge the Wicked expires on a target, {1} allies within {2} yds of the target are healed for {3}.

0.Text: Reduces the mana cost of Purify and Mass Dispel by {1}% and Dispel Magic by {2}%.

1.Text: Reduces the mana cost of Purify Disease and Mass Dispel by {1}% and Dispel Magic by {2}%.

0.Text:
For each damage over time effects on the target, your Mind Flay and Mind Sear have a {1}% chance to trigger a Dark Thought. 

Dark Thought
Increases the number of charges of Mind Blast by {2}, Mind Blast has no cooldown and can be cast instantly, and can be cast while channelling Mind Flay or Mind Sear.
While you have Shadow Word: Pain, Devouring Plague, and Vampiric Touch active on the same target, your Mind Blast deals {1}% more damage.

Void Bolt deals {1}% more damage.
While not in Void Form, dealing damage with Mind Flay has a {FFFFFFFF|{2}%} chance to allow you to cast Void Bolt.
While in Void Form, Void Bolt has a {FFFFFFFF|{3}%} chance to reset the cooldown on Void Bolt.

Void Bolt causes the target to become vulnerable to the void, increasing their damage taken from you by {1}% for {2} sec. This effect may only be active on one target at a time.

Casting Void Bolt on an enemy that is already vulnerable extends the duration of your Voidform by {3} sec, or {4} sec if Void Bolt critically strikes.
Your Fae Guardians leave behind a {1}% effective copy of their benefit, lasting {FFFFFFFF|{2}} sec when they jump to a new target.

Casting Unholy Nova summons a Rattling Mage that gains {1}% additional damage and healing each time an enemy affected by Unholy Transfusion is damaged by an ally, up to {2}%.

The Rattling Mage serves you for {3} sec, blasting your target for {4} Shadow damage.

1.Text:
Casting Unholy Nova summons a Brooding Cleric that gains {1}% additional damage and healing each time an enemy affected by Unholy Transfusion is damaged by an ally, up to {2}%.

The Brooding Cleric serves you for {3} sec, healing an ally for {4}.

0.Text: Hurls a bolt of dark magic at the target, dealing {1} Shadow damage.

Enter a pact with the Death Loa, calling forth a haunted mask that lingers on a target until Fae Guardians ends.

{FFffffff|Haunted Mask:} Copies the benefit of the current faerie on its target. Follows your Direct Mask.

Mindgames lasts an additional {1} sec and reverses an additional {2}% damage or healing. When Mindgames can no longer reverse healing or damage, gain {3}% Critical Strike for each second remaining for {4} sec.
Magically imbues the target's flesh with stitches, healing them for {1}.
Consuming a Dark Thought causes your shadow to animate after a moment, dealing {1} Shadow damage over {2} sec to all enemies within {3} yards of your target.
Shadow energy radiates from the target, dealing {1} Shadow damage over {2} sec to all enemies within {3} yards of the target.
Divine Conversation increases the effectiveness of your next Holy-Word-affecting spell by {1}%.
Increases the threshold at which Shadow Word: Death will do extra damage by {1}%. Increases the extra damage by {2}%.
Blesses the target area, healing up to {1} allies for {2} over {3} sec.
Restore {1} health every {2} sec.
Launches a volley of darkness at the target, causing {1} Shadow damage to an enemy or {2} healing to an ally over {3} sec. Castable while moving.
Hurls a bolt of dark magic, dealing {1} Shadow damage and {2} Shadow damage to all enemies within {3} yards of the target. Damage reduced beyond {4} targets.

Your periodic Shadow Word: Pain and Vampiric Touch damage has a {1}% chance to apply Echoing Void, max {2} targets.

Each time Echoing Void is applied, it has a chance to collapse, consuming a stack every {3} sec to deal {4} Shadow damage to all nearby enemies. Damage reduced beyond {5} targets.

If an enemy dies with Echoing Void, all stacks collapse immediately.

Summoning Mindbender causes you to gain a benefit based on your target's current state or increases its duration by {1} sec if no state matches.

{ffffffff|Healthy}: You and your Mindbender deal {2}% additional damage.

{ffffffff|Enraged}: Devours the Enraged effect, increasing your Haste by {3}%.

{ffffffff|Stunned}: Generates {4} Insanity every {5} sec.

{ffffffff|Feared}: You and your Mindbender deal {6}% increased damage and do not break Fear effects.
Power Word: Shield increases the effectiveness of your next direct damage or healing spell by {1}%.
Penance increases the strength of your next Power Word: Shield by {1}% of its damage or {2}% of its healing.
Casting Prayer of Mending reduces the cast time of your next Heal or Prayer of Healing by {1} sec and increases their Holy Word cooldown reduction effect by {2} sec.
When Holy Word: Serenity or Holy Word: Sanctify finish their cooldown, you gain {1}% critical strike chance for {2} sec.
Mind Blast increases the damage of your next Devouring Plague by {1}%, stacking up to {2} times.
Devouring Plague increases your haste by {1}% for {2} sec.
When Prayer of Mending jumps or expires, it increases the damage and healing of your next Holy Word by {1}%, stacking up to {2} times.
Devouring Plague damage increased by {1}%. Every {2} casts of Devouring Plague increases the damage of Shadowy Apparitions conjured within the next {3} sec by {4}%.

Atonements applied by Power Word: Radiance last {1} sec longer. Your spells have a chance to cause your next Power Word: Radiance to be instant and cost {2}% less mana. Can accumulate up to {3} charges.

Ascend into the air and unleash a massive barrage of Penance bolts, causing {1} Holy damage to enemies or {2} healing to allies over {3} sec.

While ascended, gain a shield for {4}% of your health. In addition, you are unaffected by knockbacks or crowd control effects.
Ultimate Penitence emits an explosion of light, healing up to {1} allies around you for {2} and applying Atonement at {3}% of normal duration.
Each Penance bolt you fire reduces the cooldown of Ultimate Penitence by {1} sec.
Renew's healing has a chance to cause your next Holy Word: Sanctify or Holy Word: Serenity to not consume a charge when cast and cost {1}% less Mana, accumulating up to {2} charges.

Each time you take damage from Shadow Word: Death, gain a stack of Death's Torment, increasing the initial damage of your next cast of Shadow Word: Pain by {1}% or increasing the damage of your next Shadow Crash by {2}%, stacking up to {3} times.
